data.html:
Cards

Cards are the backbone of Coberta. Cards are a fixed width but have variable height. However, they do have a minimum height of 200px.

Fitness

Using MyFitnessPal you can see an overview of your macro intake for the day. To keep it nice and simple we're sticking with RGB colours; #00FF00 for protein, #0000FF for carb, and #FF0000 for fat.
